Well I don't know much about anything, but I sure liked this film. In short, it was creative, humorous, simple, and heartwarming.
I could tell that the people working behind the production did a lot of research on Tasmanian Tigers as well. It's amazing how much they understand about them.
They really put their heart into creating a movie that originated with kids who were asking questions and making observations. No wonder it's winning awards left and right
